Class DaoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leonovich.itcrowd.dao.configuration.DaoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
@EnableTransactionManagement
@ComponentScan(value="com.leonovich.itcrowd")
@PropertySource(value="classpath:application.properties")
public class DaoConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration class Hibernate ORM with Spring annotations for application. Created 14.08.15.
